sentences: Pahad sõnad! Minu õde on väga viisakas.
Neil tundus, et pahad juhused olid märk rahu eest.
Tema pahad hinged kattusid ühe teise üle.
context: 'Pahad' is an adjective in Estonian used to describe something negative, morally wrong, or harmful. It commonly describes bad behavior, evil intentions, or wicked actions and can modify nouns like words, deeds, or people.
